CustomField.formula: ShipStreet__c + ' ' + ShipHouseNo__c + IF(ISNULL(ShipHouseNoExt__c), '', ' ' + ShipHouseNoExt__c) + IF(ISNULL(ShipAddressExt__c), '', BR() + ShipAddressExt__c) + ShipPostalCode__c + ' ' + ShipCity__c + IF(ISNULL(ShipCityExt__c), '', ' ' + ShipCityExt__c)
CustomField.label: Lieferadresse
